mapper.select: SELECT factory_name AS name, SUM(amount) AS value FROM co_contract_product WHERE company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY factory_name
SELECT product_no AS name, SUM(amount) AS value FROM co_contract_product WHERE company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY product_no ORDER BY SUM(amount) DESC LIMIT 15

SELECT st_online_info.A1 AS name, IFNULL(st_sys_log1.value, 0) AS value FROM st_online_info LEFT JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TIME, "%H") AS NAME, COUNT(*) AS VALUE FROM st_sys_log WHERE company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(TIME, "%H")) st_sys_log1 ON st_online_info.A1 = st_sys_log1.name
